{"post_stream":{"posts":[{"id":3503165,"name":"","username":"robojack","avatar_template":"/letter_avatar_proxy/v4/letter/r/49beb7/{size}.png","created_at":"2025-02-05T18:53:26.555Z","cooked":"

I’ve been working on getting video from a test robot to Smartdashboard and have it working with 2 cameras. When I take my laptop to our robotics group the cameras will not work. they don’t show up when I start the driver station and they don’t show up as options when I try to add them. The robots are the same in terms of controllers etc and both have FRC_roboRIO_2025_v2.0. Driving the robot seems to work just fine but no cameras are recognized. Since the config for SmartDashboard is saved on the drive station, I’m not sure why the cameras won’t work.

Maybe there’s something I don’t understand about using different robots but I’m not sure where to look.

Any help appreciated

Cliff
